import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import{ ADD_MATCH} from '../store/actionType/actionType' const { } = actionType; function AddMatch() { const matches = useSelector(state =>state.matches) const id = matches.length() +1 const dispatch =useDispatch() const addHandler = () =>{ dispatch({ type:ADD_MATCH, payload:id }) } return (
) } export default AddMatch
